mapper.sql: select m.id, m.name, m.url, m.icon, m.description, m.pid, m.enabled, m.is_deleted, m.created_time, m.updated_time from sys_menu m
mapper.select: left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.is_deleted = 0 and rm.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (name, url, icon, description, pid, enabled) values (#{name}, #{url}, #{icon}, #{description}, #{pid}, #{enabled})
